text:
This club offers a wide range of facilities, making it the perfect spot for both relaxation and active recreation.

üèä Swimming Pool ‚Äì The pool is well-maintained, clean, and spacious. Perfect for both casual swimmers and those looking to get in some serious laps.
üé≥ Bowling Alley ‚Äì A fun and well-kept facility with great lanes, making it ideal for both beginners and experienced bowlers.
üéæ Tennis Courts ‚Äì The courts are in excellent condition, and booking was smooth. Great place to enjoy a game with friends.
üßó Wall Climbing ‚Äì A highlight of the club! The climbing walls cater to different skill levels, and the instructors are friendly and helpful.
üéâ Function Rooms ‚Äì Well-equipped and spacious, making them perfect for private gatherings, meetings, and celebrations.

The overall atmosphere of the club is fantastic, with a welcoming staff and well-maintained amenities. Whether you're here for sports, relaxation, or social events, CSC has everything you need. Highly recommended!

Had been here for a book launch at their auditorium hall. Well maintained facilities. Entrance to club with the various small aquarium displays was very soothing. Didn‚Äôt get to explore other facilities. But looked promising.

Went to their restaurant and was pleasantly surprised by how big their civil service club is with other facilities including bowling alley, swimming pools etc
Look forward to come back

Plentiful of facilities including a Chinese restaurant and games room on level one. There is also a bowling alley. The parking lots are sufficient and signages are adequate to help you find your way around. The club is nicely lit up with a  cheery ambience.
Great place; very cooling and the receptionist counter and e shoe counter receptionist are both very very good n polite. Awesome job u both. I like it here. Well recommended guys!
